sections.purpose: To safely collect and dispose of used needles, blades, and other sharp biomedical waste.
sections.scope: Applicable to all areas handling sharps in Pharmacology and animal facilities.
procedure: Place puncture-resistant sharps containers at points of use.
Immediately discard used needles, syringes, scalpels, and glass shards without recapping.
Do not fill the container beyond the marked fill line (usually two-thirds full).
Seal the container securely when full.
Label with biohazard symbol and send for treatment and disposal as per institutional SOP.
precautions: Never attempt to reopen or reuse sharps containers.
Do not push sharps down with hands.
Place containers out of reach of unauthorized persons and animals.
Follow local biomedical waste management regulations.
